title: Now that we have Blood Moon Diana there's another skin we need.
body:
Now that we have Blood **Moon** Diana When are we getting **Blood** Moon Vladimir.

I can't  be the only one who want's/Needs this.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: i think its too many bm skins now i dont think they should make anymore
Are you just saying this because in Avatar: The Last Airbender the Blood Benders get more strength under the blood moon?
